title: ModelBenchmark
description: Schema for model performance scores on benchmarks

model_benchmark_id.description: Unique identifier for this model-benchmark result

score.description: Raw score achieved on the benchmark

normalized_score.description: Score normalized to 0-1 range for cross-benchmark comparison

is_self_reported.description: Whether the score was self-reported by the model creator

self_reported_source_link.description: URL to the source of self-reported scores

verified_by_llmstats.description: Whether the score has been independently verified by llm-stats

verification_date.description: Date when the score was independently verified

verification_notes.description: Additional notes about the verification process

created_at.description: Timestamp when the record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

benchmark_name.description: Display name of the benchmark (denormalized for convenience)
